title: (SO) MIST SDLAN WIFI monitoring - CSO alarm capability migration
description:
Description
this epic is  focusing on other alarms for what we need to build datascraping and  on CSO built alarming migration to MIST

integrate the migrated alarms for eva integrated syslog interface as well
